document.full_text: in a match featuring 18 breaks of serve, dinara safina edged fellow russian anastasia pivovarova 6-4, 2-6, 6-4 friday to reach the semifinals of the grand prix sar.
document.title: safina into semifinals, oudin loses in morocco
lines_and_colors: in a match featuring 18 breaks of serve, dinara safina edged fellow russian anastasia pivovarova 6-4, 2-6, 6-4 friday to reach the semifinals of the grand prix sar.
